mapper.select: SELECT t2.item_name itemName, t2.item_type itemType, t1.invest_remark investRemark, IFNULL(t1.invest_plan_limit,0) investPlanLimit, IFNULL(t2.invest_plan,0) investPlan, IFNULL(t2.invest_total,0) investTotal, IFNULL(t2.invest_pre,0) investPre, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(label_name) FROM maa_conf_label WHERE FIND_IN_SET(label_value, t2.item_type) AND label_code = 'ITEM_TYPE' ) itemTypeStr FROM ipo_case t1 INNER JOIN ipo_invest_item t2 ON t1.id = t2.bid WHERE t1.id = #{id}
